# Nomad clusters

This section contains content for creating and federating Nomad clusters.
Connect nodes into a cluster, federate multi-region clusters, and configure a
web UI reverse proxy. Review multi-region federation considerations and
failure scenarios. Implement load balancing using Fabio, HAProxy, NGINX, or
Traefik. Manage external traffic with application load balancing.
